user_input: Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Add Hydrogen as a new energy carrier object in the model using the new_carrier_pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier.', select the most appropriate object from the available options.

tasks.description: Create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the NT, NT_HE and NT_LE Scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050.', select the appropriate demand profile targets.

tasks.description: Split the nodes to partition the existing model elements as required by the scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Split the nodes', select the appropriate nodes or model elements for partitioning.

tasks.description: Convert the modified model to tst format.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Convert to tst format', select the appropriate data file for modification.
